thread.title: Mandy Moore And Shane West Had A 'Walk To Remember' Reunion
thread.title_full: Mandy Moore And Shane West Had A 'Walk To Remember' Reunion

author: Jenna Amatulli
title: Mandy Moore And Shane West Had A 'Walk To Remember' Reunion
text:
Mandy Moore And Shane West Had A 'Walk To Remember' Reunion Love is real. 02/06/2017 12:53 pm ET Jenna Amatulli Trends Editor, The Huffington Post 
If you’ve been raising your hands in hope that Jamie and Landon from “ A Walk to Remember ” would reunite one last time, then the world has answered your prayers. 
In her most recent Instagram post, actress and singer Mandy Moore shared an adorable reunion photo of herself with actor Shane West and director Adam Shankman. 
“Welp,” her caption reads, “These 2 gentlemen are still some of the best around. Loved catching up with ya.” A photo posted by Mandy Moore (@mandymooremm) on Feb 5, 2017 at 10:27pm PST 
Shankman, who directed the 2002 film, also shared a photo of the evening ― revealing the group had gotten together for a three-hour “catch-up dinner.” 
He also quoted the film, saying that the love between West and Moore was “like the wind: I can’t see it, but I will always feel it.” A photo posted by Adam Shankman (@adamshankman) on Feb 6, 2017 at 9:32am PST 
The reunion comes on the heels of the film’s 15-year anniversary in January. West, Moore and Shankman all shared images from “A Walk to Remember” on social media to commemorate the occasion. A photo posted by Mandy Moore (@mandymooremm) on Jan 25, 2017 at 8:01am PST A photo posted by Adam Shankman (@adamshankman) on Jan 25, 2017 at 10:50am PST A photo posted by Shane West (@theshanewest) on Jan 25, 2017 at 10:26am PST 
Amid discussion of the anniversary, Moore told Entertainment Weekly that a part of her “absolutely fell in love” with West during filming because “he was the character [Landon] to me.” 
We’re not crying. You’re crying. Also on HuffPost:
